item.title: A Case Study on the Yocto Project
item.description: In this post, it’ll be tried to explain what is Yocto Project by building a real world example - a barcode reader. So let’s start! Introduction Following excerpt is taken from the Wikipedia article 1 on the Yocto Project. The Yocto Project is a Linux Foundation collaborative open source project whose goal is to produce tools and processes that enable the creation of Linux distributions for embedded and IoT software that are independent of the underlying architecture of the embedded hardware.
